poem:
**The Choir Director's Song**

In the echo of young voices,  
a teacher lifts her baton  
not just towards music,  
but to an invisible thread  
of awakening.  
Each note unlocks  
a lesson unmeasured,  
a harmony that mends  
the silent fractures,  
tuning life into  
an ensemble  
of imperfect grace.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative. The teacher’s unconventional methods are inevitably questioned;". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
